translations: n．塞子（复数）：用于封闭瓶子、桶等容器的圆形塞子。
· We need to replace the bungs on these barrels.
我们需要更换这些桶上的塞子。

sentences.sentence: Keep container closed and drum bungs in place.
sentences.translation: 保持容器密封，并塞紧塞子。

sentences.sentence: Politicians in all parts of the world want bungs.
sentences.translation: 全世界的政客都想要好处。
